name: Mutual Fund
dis: A mutual fund is an investment structure that's also professionally managed and collects money from numerous individuals to buy securities.

name: Life Insurance
dis: An insurance policy holder and an insurer or assure enter into a contract for life insurance under which the insurer agrees to pay a predetermined beneficiary a certain amount of money in the event that the policyholder passes away.

name: General Insurance
dis: General insurance refers to insurance contracts that do not fall within the category of life insurance.

name: Stock
dis: Stocks can be a valuable part of your investment portfolio. Owning stocks in different companies can help you build your savings, protect your money from inflation and taxes, and maximize income from your investments.
